price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߘߊߎߘߊ߫ ߛߐ߫ ߛߎ߬ߟߋ߬ߡߊ߯ߣߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ، ߖߐ߲߬ ߓߘߍ߬ߞߏ ߘߊ߲߭ ߠߋ߬ ߝߛߊߦߌ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߟߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ߠߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lidāwūda sulaymāna niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
